name: Turbomania
description:
Written for the 16K Spectrum in fast-action machine code, this is a top-down maze style game where the player has to drive around a randomly-generated maze painting it cyan while avoiding the enemy cars.  Various items appear randomly from time to time and may be collected to give bonuses - although some, such as the speed cameras should be avoided as hazards!  The fire button can be used in an emergency to rearrange the maze as you are driving but use this feature sparingly as you'll have to re-paint some areas if you use it.

At the end of each level the player is invited to play one of a few minigames (yes, still in 16K) for a bonus.

Runs on a ZX Spectrum so an emulator is required to play this game.
